page.title: 11A NEW SCHOOL
page.content: A new school opened in Trelewis in September 1984. It replaced the old buildings of a separate junior school and infant department. The new primary school is positioned in idylic surroundings providing safe access well away from the main road. The school is built in the semi- open plan system.Its position adjacent to Tir-Bach farm and close to Taff-Merthyr colliery giving it a mixture of agriculture and industry makes it ideal school for topic work and environmental studies. -------------------------------------- A new school opened in Edwardsville in September 1975 and was built to replace the schools at Webster Street, Treharris Cental, Woodlands and Edwardsville itself. The school, although occupying one site consists of two separate schools,junior and
